show_name: Monster Musume no Iru Nichijou OVA
other_title: Everyday Life with Monster Girls OVA
モンスター娘のいる日常 OVA
opening_theme: "Saikousoku Fall in Love (最高速 Fall in Love)" by Miia (Sora Amamiya), Papi (Ari Ozawa), Centorea (Natsuki Aikawa), Suu (Mayuka Nomura), Mero (Haruka Yamazaki), Rachnera (Sakura Nakamura
